The action followed reports of wrongful additions to electoral rolls in Baruipur Purba. Disciplinary proceedings and FIRs are expected. This is due to potential criminal misconduct.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/voter-list-lapse-eci-suspends-4-bengal-officers-over-fake-entries-accused-of-sharing-passwords-to-database/articleshow/123119355.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/voter-list-lapse-eci-suspends-4-bengal-officers-over-fake-entries-accused-of-sharing-passwords-to-database/articleshow/123119355.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 18:16:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40236" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123120082,imgsize-40236.cms"/></item><item><title>Massive cloudburst in Uttarakhand: Entire village swept away; 4 dead, several missing</title><description><![CDATA[A cloudburst-triggered flash flood in Uttarkashi's Dharali village caused widespread devastation, sweeping away homes, shops, and roads. Rescue teams, including SDRF and Army personnel, are on-site conducting relief operations amid fears that laborers may be trapped. The Meteorological Department has issued warnings for continued heavy rainfall across Uttarakhand, particularly in hilly areas, until August 10.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/uttarakhand-cloudburst-flash-floods-hit-uttarkashi-several-villagers-washed-away/articleshow/123115132.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/uttarakhand-cloudburst-flash-floods-hit-uttarkashi-several-villagers-washed-away/articleshow/123115132.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 14:34:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2608966" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123115388,imgsize-2608966.cms"/></item><item><title>OpenAI education head to students: If you use AI as an answer machine, you are not …</title><description><![CDATA[OpenAI's Leah Belsky urges students and institutions to embrace AI as a tool for enhancing critical thinking and creativity, rather than simply banning it. She emphasizes that AI proficiency is now a core competency for graduates entering the workforce. OpenAI has launched 'Study Mode' in ChatGPT, featuring a Socratic method to encourage active learning.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-education-head-to-students-if-you-use-ai-as-an-answer-machine-you-are-not-/articleshow/123073206.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-education-head-to-students-if-you-use-ai-as-an-answer-machine-you-are-not-/articleshow/123073206.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 17:57:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="17138" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073188,imgsize-17138.cms"/></item><item><title>Tougher checks for marriage-based Green Cards: US issues guidelines</title><description><![CDATA[USCIS has updated its policy manual to combat marriage fraud in family-based immigration, prompted by concerns over fraudulent applications and national security risks. The updated policy mandates comprehensive evidence of bona fide marriages and rigorous interviews. Individuals convicted of marriage fraud face imprisonment, fines, and deportation, reflecting stricter scrutiny and vetting procedures.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/tougher-checks-for-marriage-based-green-cards-us-issues-fresh-guidelines-to-detect-fraud-all-you-need-to-about-the-new-policy/articleshow/123117342.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/tougher-checks-for-marriage-based-green-cards-us-issues-fresh-guidelines-to-detect-fraud-all-you-need-to-about-the-new-policy/articleshow/123117342.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 16:14:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="450755" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123117416,imgsize-450755.cms"/></item><item><title>'Right to choose': Russia backs India, rebukes Trump's tariff threat over crude oil</title><description><![CDATA[The Kremlin has defended India's right to choose its trading partners, criticizing Trump's threat to raise tariffs over Russian oil imports. India vowed to protect its interests, noting that the US and EU also trade with Russia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/right-to-choose-after-india-russia-rebukes-trumps-tariff-threat-over-crude-oil-calls-it-illegitimate-in-strong-reaction/articleshow/123116428.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/right-to-choose-after-india-russia-rebukes-trumps-tariff-threat-over-crude-oil-calls-it-illegitimate-in-strong-reaction/articleshow/123116428.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 15:57:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30386" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123117079,imgsize-30386.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: 'Dominate' - Gautam Gambhir's bold message to Team India after victory in The Oval</title><description><![CDATA[Gautam Gambhir's leadership and Shubman Gill's captaincy inspired India to a thrilling six-run victory at The Oval, drawing the Test series 2-2. Mohammed Siraj's five-wicket haul secured the win, India's narrowest ever in Test history. This triumph boosted India to third in the ICC World Test Championship standings, highlighting the team's evolving identity and promising future.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-dominate-gautam-gambhirs-bold-message-to-team-india-after-victory-in-the-oval/articleshow/123118900.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-dominate-gautam-gambhirs-bold-message-to-team-india-after-victory-in-the-oval/articleshow/123118900.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 17:21:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="73972" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123118941,imgsize-73972.cms"/></item><item><title>Aravind Srinivas warns: AI can now wipe out two white-collar roles</title><description><![CDATA[Perplexity AI's CEO Aravind Srinivas introduced Comet, an AI-powered browser poised to revolutionize white-collar automation. Comet integrates with platforms like Gmail and LinkedIn to automate tasks, potentially replacing recruiters' and administrative assistants' roles. It can identify candidates, manage schedules, and handle communications with a single prompt. While some tech leaders foresee job displacement, others believe AI will enhance human capabilities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/one-ai-prompt-two-white-collar-jobs-gone-perplexity-ceo-aravind-srinivass-bold-claim-sparks-debate/articleshow/123115981.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/one-ai-prompt-two-white-collar-jobs-gone-perplexity-ceo-aravind-srinivass-bold-claim-sparks-debate/articleshow/123115981.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 15:43:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="38042" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123116763,imgsize-38042.cms"/></item><item><title>Father-in-law tips off cops about booze party in Surat hotel; all arrested</title><description><![CDATA[Surat police raided a hotel party at 'Weekend Address' following a tip about liquor consumption, arresting six individuals, including two female artists and four businessmen. Union minister Nityanand Rai moved the resolution, previously passed by Lok Sabha. This decision follows N Biren Singh's resignation as chief minister amidst violence between Meitei and Kuki-Zomi communities, displacing thousands.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/constitutional-obligation-parliament-extends-presidents-rule-in-manipur-by-6-months-effective-from-august-13/articleshow/123115142.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/constitutional-obligation-parliament-extends-presidents-rule-in-manipur-by-6-months-effective-from-august-13/articleshow/123115142.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 14:29:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="68914" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123115988,imgsize-68914.cms"/></item><item><title>To dodge Rs 6k bill, youths fake bone in veg biryani at Gorakhpur restaurant</title><description><![CDATA[In Gorakhpur, a group of young men tried to avoid paying their restaurant bill. They falsely claimed a bone was in their vegetarian biryani. The restaurant staff checked the CCTV footage. The footage revealed the youths planting the bone themselves. Police arrived to maintain order. No formal complaint has been filed by either party in this incident at Biryani Bae.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/varanasi/youths-caught-faking-bone-in-veg-biryani-to-skip-bill/articleshow/123102460.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/varanasi/youths-caught-faking-bone-in-veg-biryani-to-skip-bill/articleshow/123102460.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 23:44:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="987756" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123110426,imgsize-987756.cms"/></item><item><title>GitHub CEO to software engineers: Either you ..., or get out of your career</title><description><![CDATA[GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke warns software engineers to embrace AI or risk career obsolescence, emphasizing AI's central role in coding. The final seat allotment list, including special categories, will be released on August 13.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/delhi-university-csas-round-3-seat-allocation-results-released-check-direct-link-to-download-list-here/articleshow/123118947.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/delhi-university-csas-round-3-seat-allocation-results-released-check-direct-link-to-download-list-here/articleshow/123118947.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 17:18:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="558356" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123118973,imgsize-558356.cms"/></item><item><title>CBSE Class 10 Supplementary Result 2025 released: Check marksheet</title><description><![CDATA[The CBSE declared the Class 10 Supplementary Exam Result 2025 on August 5, accessible on official websites and platforms like DigiLocker. Contracts will be awarded to private companies.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/nasa-to-build-moon-reactor-by-2030-outpacing-china-russia-lunar-ambitions-with-a-100-kilowatt-power-system/articleshow/123118414.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/nasa-to-build-moon-reactor-by-2030-outpacing-china-russia-lunar-ambitions-with-a-100-kilowatt-power-system/articleshow/123118414.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 16:59:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="38186" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123118478,imgsize-38186.cms"/></item><item><title>Black rain alert twice in 6 hrs: Hong Kong flights delayed, public services hit</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/black-rain-alert-issued-twice-in-6-hrs-heavy-rains-batter-hong-kong-flights-delayed-public-services-hit/articleshow/123114792.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/black-rain-alert-issued-twice-in-6-hrs-heavy-rains-batter-hong-kong-flights-delayed-public-services-hit/articleshow/123114792.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 15:32:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2338347" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123115848,imgsize-2338347.cms"/></item><item><title>'Carried India without Virat, Rohit': Ex-Pak cricketer's remark on Shubman</title><description><![CDATA[Danish Kaneria lauded India's Test series performance against England, praising Shubman Gill's leadership in the absence of senior players. ISRO is also planning asteroid missions. These events highlight the need for planetary defense.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/nasa-monitors-asteroid-2025-ot7-as-it-approaches-earth-on-august-5-size-speed-and-flyby-distance-revealed/articleshow/123116097.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/nasa-monitors-asteroid-2025-ot7-as-it-approaches-earth-on-august-5-size-speed-and-flyby-distance-revealed/articleshow/123116097.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 15:45:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43490" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123116159,imgsize-43490.cms"/></item><item><title>Siraj's success story: Mother's daily prayers, visit to late father's grave</title><description><![CDATA[Mohammed Siraj's journey is fuelled by his father's dream and his mother's prayers. The joint operation, involving the Army, police, and BSF, led to the seizure of arms, explosives, and ammunition.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/operation-nagni-terror-hideout-busted-in-jks-kupwara-weapons-recovered/articleshow/123112633.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/operation-nagni-terror-hideout-busted-in-jks-kupwara-weapons-recovered/articleshow/123112633.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 12:30:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1074065" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123112590,imgsize-1074065.cms"/></item><item><title>'Unwarranted observation': INDIA bloc backs Rahul Gandhi on SC rap</title><description><![CDATA[The INDIA bloc has strongly criticized the Supreme Court's remarks against Rahul Gandhi regarding his comments on the Indian Army and Chinese aggression. The alliance defended Rahul's right to question the government as leader of opposition, emphasizing the duty to hold the government accountable on matters of national interest.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/unwarranted-observation-india-bloc-backs-rahul-gandhi-on-sc-rap-calls-it-his-duty-to-speak-on-national-issues/articleshow/123113331.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/unwarranted-observation-india-bloc-backs-rahul-gandhi-on-sc-rap-calls-it-his-duty-to-speak-on-national-issues/articleshow/123113331.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 13:00:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45618" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123114520,imgsize-45618.cms"/></item><item><title>Delhi: 15-year-old girl out for snacks shot dead in market by ‘boyfriend’; accused on the run</title><description><![CDATA[In a tragic incident in Delhi's Jahangirpuri, a 15-year-old girl was fatally shot by her 20-year-old boyfriend in a crowded market area. The accused, who is currently absconding, allegedly fired multiple rounds at the girl in front of a clinic, leading to her death.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/15-year-old-girl-shot-dead-in-market-boyfriend-suspect/articleshow/123101798.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/15-year-old-girl-shot-dead-in-market-boyfriend-suspect/articleshow/123101798.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 23:22:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="15392" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123107776,imgsize-15392.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[The Genius Act marks a turning point for stablecoins, offering them legal legitimacy and regulatory clarity. “This legitimisation of stablecoins is certainly going to give a huge boost,” says Eswar Prasad, Professor at Cornell University.       <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK.     <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
